modules.name: aggs-matrix-stats
modules.description: Adds aggregations whose input are a list of numeric fields and output includes a matrix.

modules.name: analysis-common
modules.description: Adds "built in" analyzers to Elasticsearch.

modules.name: constant-keyword
modules.description: Module for the constant-keyword field type, which is a specialization of keyword for the case when all documents have the same value.

modules.name: flattened
modules.description: Module for the flattened field type, which allows JSON objects to be flattened into a single field.

modules.name: frozen-indices
modules.description: A plugin for the frozen indices functionality

modules.name: ingest-common
modules.description: Module for ingest processors that do not require additional security permissions or have large dependencies and resources

modules.name: ingest-geoip
modules.description: Ingest processor that uses looksup geo data based on ip adresses using the Maxmind geo database

modules.name: ingest-user-agent
modules.description: Ingest processor that extracts information from a user agent

modules.description: Lucene expressions integration for Elasticsearch

modules.description: Mustache scripting integration for Elasticsearch

modules.description: An easy, safe and fast scripting language for Elasticsearch

modules.description: Adds advanced field mappers

modules.description: This module adds the support parent-child queries and aggregations

modules.name: percolator
modules.description: Percolator module adds capability to index queries and query these queries by specifying documents

modules.description: The Rank Eval module adds APIs to evaluate ranking quality.

modules.description: The Reindex module adds APIs to reindex from one index to another or update documents in place.
